means: 促进( facilitate的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: He argued that the economic recovery had been facilitated by his tough stance.
sentence.Network_cn: 他认为他的强硬立场推动了经济的复苏。

sentence.Network_en: The investigation of dark nebulas has been facilitated by a new discovery.
sentence.Network_cn: 对暗星云的研究被一种新发现所推进.

sentence.Network_en: Rice production duly expanded, greatly facilitated, it was thought, by subsidized credit.
sentence.Network_cn: 曾经有一种观点, 补贴信贷会极大地促进大米生产, 使其充分发展.

The course is learner - led facilitated by the instructor ., 课程学习以学员为主 , 教授引导 , 启发.

药剂学专业医学名词-词汇翻译 ... 血管外给药 extravascular administration 促进扩散 facilitated diffusion 禁食 fast.

entry.def: To facilitate an action or process, especially one that you would like to happen, means to make it easier or more likely to happen.

example.ex: The new airport will facilitate the development of tourism...
example.tran: 新机场将促进旅游业的发展。

example.ex: He argued that the economic recovery had been facilitated by his tough stance.
example.tran: 他认为他的强硬立场推动了经济的复苏。

auth_sentence.content: None facilitated deficit spending by buying up his government's bonds.
auth_sentence.res_content: None facilitated deficit spending by buying up his government's bonds.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: None facilitated deficit spending by buying up his government's bonds.

auth_sentence.content: The growth of genealogical Web research has facilitated many such discoveries.
auth_sentence.res_content: The growth of genealogical Web research has facilitated many such discoveries.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The growth of genealogical Web research has facilitated many such discoveries.

auth_sentence.content: I am sincerely sorry that failings in the system facilitated his murder.
auth_sentence.res_content: I am sincerely sorry that failings in the system facilitated his murder.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I am sincerely sorry that failings in the system facilitated his murder.

Sentence.sentence: Patient disclosure, facilitated by the therapist, seems also to facilitate the process of normalizing.
